feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:26 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -11.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 09:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -11.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -17.2°C
Wind: NW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
